Examod Proctoring Extension
Examod Proctoring Extension is a powerful Google Chrome extension that 
integrates with Examod Digital Exam & Assessment Platform. This 
innovative tool gives candidates more control and security during online 
exams. With screen share recording during the exam and control of active 
tabs in the browser, teaching institutions and instructors have a sure-fire 
solution to protect student integrity and exam processes.
Highlights:
• Screen Recording: The ability to record computer screens with 
screen sharing during the exam allows monitoring student performance
without any suspicion.
• Tab Controls: The extension offers powerful controls to prevent 
candidates from accessing browser tabs during the exam.
• Easy to Use: Examod Proctoring Extension can be installed quickly 
and is user-friendly. It does not impose any additional burden on 
candidates or authorizeds.
• Privacy-Focused: It offers an approach that respects candidate 
privacy and complies with data protection standards.
Why Choose Examod Proctoring Extension?
• It is an excellent tool to effectively monitoring student performance 
during the exam.
• Protects candidate integrity and prevents cheating.
• Easy to install and use so you can get started quickly.
• Prioritizes candidate privacy and data security.
Make your online exams more secure and effective with Examod 
Proctoring Extension. Monitor your candidates more closely and strengthen
your exam processes.
